price: Enti sε wͻbɛnya aboterε a, εneε egya no mu ne wͻn asetena. Sε wͻpε sε wͻyε biribi ma εsͻ (Nyankopͻn) ani a, wͻnnyε (nnipa) a wͻyε biribi ma εsͻ ani (wͻ saa Da no).
arabic: فَإِن يَصۡبِرُواْ فَٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوٗى لَّهُمۡۖ وَإِن يَسۡتَعۡتِبُواْ فَمَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُعۡتَبِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-in yaṣbirū fal-nāru mathwan lahum wa-in yastaʿtibū famā hum mina al-muʿ'tabīna
